message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for you! I'm offering it for $200. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I am interested in purchasing the product, but I can only pay $150. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $150 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $175, but that's my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $160 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
